metadata.title: CVE-2018-10114 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GEGL through 0.3.32. Thegegl_buffer_iterate_read_simple function in buffer/gegl-buffer-access.callows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (write accessviolation) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a malformed PPMfile, related to improper restrictions on memory allocation in theppm_load_read_header function in operations/external/ppm-load.c.

criterions.comment: gegl package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
